TABLE.NAME: question_graphchecker_opts
TABLE.COMMENT: Extension of the graphchecker question table

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question this option applies to

FIELD.NAME: answertype
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of answer we expect the student to give.

FIELD.NAME: answerpreload
FIELD.COMMENT: Text to be preloaded into the question answer box.

FIELD.NAME: answer
FIELD.COMMENT: A solution to the problem. Should satisfy all the test cases (and may be used to generate solutions to them).

FIELD.NAME: validateonsave
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, the sample answer will be checked when saving and saving will be aborted if the tests don't pass

FIELD.NAME: tests
FIELD.COMMENT: The test cases, as a JSON string
